Posts.EditableText:
This game is the partner to a real-life geocache. Players must complete the game to get the co-ordinates for the real world cache. I've only had three people find the cache so far, and would appreciate some more feedback on the game. Unfortunately, despite having 202 plays and 45 downloads, no one has left any reviews yet. It's my first game, and I'm currently working on another game-cache concept, so would appreciate more input.

I invite you to take a look around and appreciate the local flora and fauna, but beware of the squirrels.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tzlhbdzwf0svfils4ufoqq/geocaching-in-the-park

Posts.EditableText: I've passed this on to my friend who is an uber geocacher. I'll pass on any comments about it!
